description:
Creativity seems you away from you? Yet you want or need to develop this quality ...
This tour will allow you to realize that you are creative and find out what you are creative, thanks to a "test of creative thinking" inspired Torrance. You will understand what can multiply or hinder your creative skills and how to create an enabling environment.
Each step of the creative process will be thoroughly described, and our worker will send you and explain the basic rules of creativity. You will discover how to create creative work environment.

Who is this course?
To all the men and women who want to get around the issue and want to feed their general knowledge, their understanding of the subject, their creative abilities in everyday life, develop professional skills become essential and active part in changing the world!


                                            Syllabus
                        
Origin of Creativity
Definition of creativity
Rational thinking vs. Creative Thinking
The rules of creativity
Foster creativity
Understanding and developing your creative abilities
The stages of the creative process
Formulate and reformulate a problem
Stimulate the imagination
Organize and sell ideas
The creative synergy
Inspiration: Creative Geniuses
Eureka! The birth of an idea
title: L'explorateur : à la découverte de la créativité
